text: Thomas Paul Poberezny (October 3, 1946 â€“ July 25, 2022) was an American aerobatic world champion. He was chairman of the annual Experimental Aircraft Association (EAA) Fly-In and Convention from 1977 to 2011 and president of EAA from 1989 to 2010. Poberezny was a member of the Eagles Aerobatic Team. In 2016, he was honored into the National Aviation Hall of Fame. Poberezny died on July 25, 2022 at the age of 75. ==References== Category:1946 births Category:2022 deaths Category:American aviators Category:Businesspeople from Wisconsin Category:Aerobatic pilots
title: Tom Poberezny
